directions: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.  Fry the potatoes for 5 minutes, then add the peppers and onions.  Season with salt and pepper.  Cook for at least 15 minutes, turning potatoes frequently, or until potatoes start to look mushy.
ingredients: 2 large red bell peppers, sliced into rings
1 large sweet onion, peeled and chopped
title: Potatoes and Peppers
